doc.title: Democracy Deadlocked: Ohio USA
doc.plot: In the classic film, 'Mr. Smith Goes to Washington'. in Democracy Deadlocked: Ohio, USA, an art teacher, a farmer and a nurse have toiled for years through government records, to the point of using grocery money to uncover shocking wrongdoing within USA's landmark election fraud lawsuit; the People vs. the State of Ohio; 2004. After demonstrating their investigative acumen in a citizen and professional journalism video partnership in 2008, the citizens will broadened their efforts into a road trip to Washington, DC to appeal to US leaders to look at how the illegal destruction of millions of voting records is currently being ignored by Ohio officials and the court. Is the landmark case dead? Will the citizen investigators win or lose? Those questions will be answered in Democracy Deadlocked: Ohio, USA.
